SEARCH
Package DAO

Class FilmDAOJS

java.lang.Object
DAO.FilmDAOJS
public class FilmDAOJS extends Object
Data Access Object (DAO) for managing Media data in the database.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static FilmDAOJS getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance of the DAO.
      Returns:
      the singleton instance of the DAO.

    • getAllMedia

      public PaginationResult getAllMedia(int pageNo, String type)
      Retrieves all media of a specific type with pagination using 'limit' and 'offset'.
      Parameters:
      pageNo - the page number for pagination
      type - the type of media
      Returns:
      a PagniationResult containing a list of media objects and a count of all media in the database.

    • getMediaByID

      public PaginationResult getMediaByID(int id, String type)
      Retrieves a media object by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the media.
      type - the type of media.
      Returns:
      the Media object with the specified ID, or null if not found.

    • getMediaByTitle

      public PaginationResult getMediaByTitle(String searchName, String type)
      Retrieves a list of media objects matching the inputed title.
      Parameters:
      searchName - the title or part of the title to search for
      type - the type of media
      Returns:
      a PaginationResult containing a list of Media objects with titles matching the search criteria, and a total count of all media in the database.

    • getMediaByYear

      public PaginationResult getMediaByYear(int searchYear, String type)
      Retrieves a list of media matching the inputed year.
      Parameters:
      searchYear - the year to search for.
      type - the type of media.
      Returns:
      a PaginationResult containing a list of Media objects from the specified year, and a total count of all media in the database.

    • insertFilm

      public boolean insertFilm(Film film) throws SQLException
      Inserts a new film into the database.
      Parameters:
      film - the Film object to be inserted.
      Returns:
      true if the film was successfully inserted, otherwise false.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a SQL error occurs.

    • updateFilm

      public boolean updateFilm(Film film) throws SQLException
      Updates an existing film in the database.
      Parameters:
      film - the Film object with updated data.
      Returns:
      true if the film was successfully updated, otherwise false.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a SQL error occurs.

    • deleteFilm

      public boolean deleteFilm(int ID) throws SQLException
      Deletes a film from the database by its ID.
      Parameters:
      ID - the ID of the film to be deleted.
      Returns:
      true if the film was successfully deleted, otherwise false.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a SQL error occurs.
